creator: gouthamn@yahoo.com
text:
It would be nice to allow the file appender to write to a DataSet on Mainframe.
And also if you can allow to specify the character encoding as part of 
configuration that would be of great help when deploying on multiple platforms
(NT, Mainframes).

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
All WriterAppenders support encodings specified by the user.  As to writing to 
a DataSet: please submit a patch if you want us to look at this proposed 
enhancement.
